p: Seven hundred and fifty grams of crude copper sulphate is dissolved in water, filtered through a cloth and dried in shade to remove external impurities. Dried copper sulphate is put into a mortar and 350 ml of Citrus acida Roxb juice is poured to make it sufficiently wet. Then, content is triturated manually using the paste under constant pressure for 6 h. The paste is allowed to dry and then preserved. Approximately 1% weight loss can be observed after purification of copper sulphate [ 12].
